useCase.name: Education
useCase.title: OpenClaw for Education: AI That Supports Students and Automates Admin
useCase.description: Educational institutions use OpenClaw to answer student questions, manage enrollment, and automate administrative tasks.
painPoints: Admin tasks take time from teaching

solutions.title: Student Support
solutions.description: Answer questions about courses, deadlines, and policies.

solutions.title: Enrollment Assistance
solutions.description: Guide prospective students through the process.
